issue.title: [CF 167] Parenthesis around conditions
issue.body:
This change will allow you to specify a number of parenthesis to put at the beginning or end of each condition, allowing you to do things like

(Condition1 and Condition2) or Condition3 or (Condition4 and (Condition5 or Condition6))

instead of the way that this would currently be interpreted:

(((((Condition1 and Condition2) or Condition3) or Condition4) and Condition5) or Condition6)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #167 | Raw
